directions: [["In a medium saucepan, heat the olive oil on medium-high heat."],["Add the couscous and cook, stirring occasionally until slightly browned and aromatic, about 3 to 5 minutes."],["Add the chicken broth and bring to a boil. Simmer for 10 to 12 minutes or until the liquid has evaporated."],["Transfer the cooked couscous to a large bowl and set aside to cool. Add the parsley, rosemary, thyme, apple, dried cranberries, and almonds."],["In a small bowl, combine the vinegar, maple syrup, salt, and pepper. Whisk in the olive oil until smooth."],["Pour the vinaigrette over the couscous and toss to coat evenly."],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
ingredients: [{"number":["2"],"units":["Tablespoon(s)"],"name":["Olive oil"],"category":["Couscous"]},{"number":["2"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["Israeli couscous"],"category":["Couscous"]},{"number":["4"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["Low sodium chicken broth"],"category":["Couscous"]},{"number":["2"],"units":["Tablespoon(s)"],"name":["Dried parsley"],"category":["Couscous"]},{"number":["1.5"],"units":["Teaspoon(s)"],"name":["Dried rosemary"],"category":["Couscous"]},{"number":["1/3"],"units":["Teaspoon(s)"],"name":["Dried thyme"],"category":["Couscous"]},{"number":["1"],"units":["Whole"],"name":["Green apple, diced"],"category":["Couscous"]},{"number":["1"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["Dried cranberries"],"category":["Couscous"]},{"number":["1/2"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["Slivered almonds, toasted"],"category":["Couscous"]},{"number":["1/4"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["Apple cider vinegar"],"category":["Vinaigrette"]},{"number":["2"],"units":["Tablespoon(s)"],"name":["Maple syrup"],"category":["Vinaigrette"]},{"number":["1"],"units":["Teaspoon(s)"],"name":["Kosher salt"],"category":["Vinaigrette"]},{"number":["1/2"],"units":["Teaspoon(s)"],"name":["Freshly ground black pepper"],"category":["Vinaigrette"]},{"number":["1/4"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["Olive oil"],"category":["Vinaigrette"]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""],"category":[""]}]
